name: com.playermake.sdk
description: The official Player Make SDK. Easy to setup, and built to power UGC in games.

samples.descriptions: Contains a sample scene, compatible with the universal render pipeline, showing how a developer's UGC content can be listed and instantiated in the scene.
Contains a sample scene, compatible with the built-in render pipeline, showing how a developer's UGC content can be listed and instantiated in the scene.

samples.description: Contains a sample scene, compatible with the built-in render pipeline, showing how to use player login codes to fetch UGC content for specific players.
